short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all of your shopping items in one place and save money.
short.zh_CN: 全网购物，一个购物车搞定。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of jumping between shopping sites? Having hard time keeping track of what you are shopping for?

With OneCart, you can add all items in one place! 

It will also monitor prices and find deals for you!

Nike, Etsy, Shein, Amazon...... OneCart supports thousands of e-commerce sites.

Save money and shopping hassle-free with OneCart!
long.zh_CN:
厌倦了穿梭在多个购物网站？时常记不住自己还有哪些种草的东西要买？

用OneCart，把所有要买的商品汇聚到一处！

鼠标右键一点，即可添加商品。OneCart还会自动帮你监测价格、寻找优惠！

Nike、Etsy、Shein、亚马逊、京东…… OneCart 已支持数千家电商网站。

省钱省心，就用OneCart！
